---
title: "document-contribution.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines constants and a function related to document contribution in the CommonWell Health Alliance context. It provides a parameter name for file names and a function to construct a URL for document contributions.

## Symbols

### `docContributionFileParam`
#### Description
A constant string that defines the parameter name used for file names in document contributions.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| docContributionFileParam | string | The parameter name "fileName" |

### `getDocContributionURL`
#### Description
A function that constructs the URL for document contributions by appending a specific path to the provided API URL.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| apiURL | string | The base API URL |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| url | string | The complete URL for document contributions |

#### Internal Logic
The function concatenates the provided `apiURL` with the path "/doc-contribution/commonwell/" to create the full URL for document contributions.

## References
This code is referenced and used in other parts of the codebase:

1. In `packages/api/src/external/commonwell/proxy/cw-process-request.ts`:
   - The `docContributionFileParam` is used to construct query parameters for attachment URLs.
   - The `getDocContributionURL` function is used to generate the base URL for document contributions.

2. In `packages/lambdas/src/cw-doc-contribution.ts`:
   - The `docContributionFileParam` is used to extract the file name from query parameters in an AWS Lambda function that handles document retrieval for CommonWell.

These references indicate that this code plays a crucial role in managing document contributions and retrievals in the CommonWell integration, particularly in constructing and parsing URLs for document-related operations.
